content: Construct a 25 word sentence using only adjectives, but each adjective must have at least three syllables and cannot be repeated. Additionally, the sentence must describe a complex, abstract concept.

The multifaceted, inconceivable, unimaginable, transcendental, ethereal, esoteric, ineffable, labyrinthine, paradoxical, transcendental, enigmatic, incalculable, metaphysical, unfathomable, philosophical, theoretical, formidable, unfathomable, intricate, convoluted, celestial, enigmatic, harmonious, and transcendental nature of consciousness.
